purpose: To provide a curated list of resources and tools for developing and integrating UI agents across multiple domains such as Web, App, and OS.
principle: Aggregates and categorizes resources, libraries, and tools related to UI agents, offering developers a centralized repository of information.
reusability: Highly reusable as a reference for developers looking to explore or implement UI agents, with categorized links and resources.
limitations: Primarily a collection of external resources; does not provide direct implementations or code examples of UI agents.
name: awesome-ui-agents
description: A curated list of of awesome UI agents resources, encompassing Web, App, OS, and beyond (continually updated)
highlight: A comprehensive and continually updated collection of UI agent resources across various platforms.
